description: Swansea City full-back Kyle Naughton signs a new deal that will keep him at the Liberty Stadium until 2020.
title: Swansea City: Defender Kyle Naughton commits Swansea future until 2020
title_page: Swansea City: Defender Kyle Naughton commits Swansea future until 2020 - BBC Sport
maintext:
Swansea City defender Kyle Naughton has signed a new contract that will keep him at the club until 2020.
The right-back had 12 months left on his previous deal, but has agreed a new two-year extension.
Naughton, 28, has made 71 appearances for the Swans since joining from Tottenham Hotspur in January 2015.
His sole goal was scored in the 2-0 win at Sunderland in May 2017 as Paul Clement's side retained their Premier League statuus
Naughton rejoined his team-mates on Monday as the Swansea squad returned for pre-season training.
